subject: p13263843
Findings: In comparison with the study of, there is again extensive post-surgical changes in the right hemithorax with elevation of the hemidiaphragm with tenting as well as displacement of the trachea to the right. The degree of right effusion has decreased. The left lung is essentially clear, though there is again prominence of interstitial markings consistent with some elevation of pulmonary venous pressure. Central line remains in place.
